Text: dog shit if you ask me

hell yeah n8h. Hey grinreaper. I watched like 15 mins of this movie, and its gay as hell. first of all, yer baggin on a church different than yours. u can fuck off, cause i read those as u were going along. The only problem was, is that u left out WHY those scriptures said what they did. u just twisted the hell outta them. they may say that, but i can twist the bible.   HEY everyone that comes along this.......watch the movie, and look these scriptures up. but read further along than what this dooshbag shows ya. he leaves out a lotta stuff, and its a bunch of bullshit!!!!
